Additions by NOVA Build Pros

Room additions by NOVA Build Pros are designed specifically to fit your needs and lifestyle, and they deliver more than just extra space. They are affordable and they add value to your home.

Enjoy peace of mind knowing we handle everything, including HVAC, electrical, and plumbing, from the initial consultation and design plans to construction and the final finishing touches!

•Kitchen Extensions
•Bathroom Additions
•Bedroom Additions
•Family Room Additions
•In-law Apartment Additions
•Sunroom Additions
•Garage Conversions
•Bump-out Additions
•Second Story Additions
•Two Story Additions

Room additions by NOVA Build Pros are designed, built, and backed by professionals. Contact us today and you'll know we say, Trust the Pros!

Design & Build

Running out of space for your growing family? Let us take what you have a make it bigger and better. If you've ever considered a room addition but didn't know where to start, we can help.

ABOUT NOVA Build Pros

Nova Build Pros delivers superior customer service to all of Northern Virginia. Our team of professionals has over 20 years of experience.
We are a Class A General Contractor offering remodeling services,roofing, siding, HVAC, electrical, and plumbing.
